content: radagast socks by virginia sattler-reimer inspired by radagast the brown friend of the flora and fauna in the lord of the rings these socks are what you ll want to wear as you head out for 2 co 52 sts and join for knitting in the round being careful not to twist placing 26 stitches on needle 1 instep stitches and 13 stitches each on needles 2 & 3 ribbing pattern work 12 rounds in k2 p2 ribbing working chart over first 26 stitches needle 1 begin working needles 2 & 3 in st st work 3 5 repeats of chart or until desired length to heel flap divide for heel if necessary rearrange sts so that last 26 sts are on single needle for heel flap rem 26 sts will not be worked until heel flap is complete place these sts on holder or spare needle until ready to work instep heel flap work back and forth on 26 heel sts only beg w/ a ws row row 1 ws k1 p24 s1p turn row 2 rs *k1 s1k repeat from * to last 2 sts k1 bring yarn to front of work s1p repeat these 2 row 13 more times a total of 14 reps turn heel row 1 ws k1 p14 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs s1p k5 skp k1 turn row 3 s1p p6 p2tog p1 turn row 4 s1p k7 skp k1 turn continue in this fashion working one more st on each row before decrease until 16 heel sts rem continued on next page ©2015 by virginia sattler-reimer 111 no radagast socks by virginia sattler-reimer gusset with rs of heel flap facing and smaller dpn pick up and knit 16
